document.full_text: a public share offering for chrysler group llc is more likely to occur in 2012 than this year because the automaker needs a longer track record of performance, the company's chief executive said on friday.
document.title: chrysler ipo not likely until 2012: sergio marchionne
lines_and_colors: a public share offering for chrysler group llc is more likely to occur in 2012 than this year because the automaker needs a longer track record of performance, the company's chief executive said on friday.
